titles.title: Effigy Mounds National Monument Additions Act
Effigy Mounds National Monument Additions Act
Effigy Mounds National Monument Additions Act
Effigy Mounds National Monument Additions Act
To authorize the addition of certain parcels to the Effigy Mounds National Monument, Iowa.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.
Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee (Amended) by Voice Vote.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Resources. H. Rept. 106-826.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 486.

action.text: Mr. Hansen moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 3745.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

calendar.text: Received in the Senate. Read twice. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 835.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 9/26/2000--Passed House amended. Effigy Mounds National Monument Additions Act - Allows the Secretary of the Interior to acquire by purchase, from willing sellers only, two parcels of land in Allamakee County, Iowa, for addition to the Effigy Mounds National Monument. Modifies the boundary of the Monument to include such parcels.Authorizes appropriations.
